alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:29PM MDT until July 03 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... West central Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 529 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Brownsville, or 7 miles south of Lead, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Brownsville around 540 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Roubaix Lake, Rochford, Nemo, Mystic and Silver City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
